title.en: Boku no Tsugai wa Thoroughbred Omega

description.en: Asaka Rei (α), who was born into a family of performing arts, is a second-generation actor who dislikes being called "the seven lights of his parents."  Thanks to his earnest efforts to improve his skills, he has a chance to be selected as the star of a new movie directed by a world-famous movie director.  However, it is the same second-generation actor, Yanagi Eito (α), who plays his opponent-the turn of fate.  Eito, who is a regular weekly magazine and has constant bad rumors, is trapped in the hotel to make a role, but Eito has a secret that upsets their destiny…
